messages: You have already started this task without finishing it

dimensions.name: truthfulness-1
dimensions.description: You are now asked to state how truthful the statement provided to you is.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: Choose the option that best fits your truthfulness judgment of the statement provided. Remember that a statement needs to be supported by facts to be true. Base your judgment on the parts of the explanation you have precedently highlighted and selected.

dimensions.name: explanation-quality
dimensions.description: You are now asked to evaluate the quality of the explanation given for the refuting/supporting of the statement.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: Choose the number, from 1 to 100, that best represent your judgment on the quality of the explanation you are provided. 1 means that the explanation is of very low quality, so it does not explain why that specific judgment was made, it is hard to understand and fails to provide reliable proof. 100 means that the explanation is of high quality, so it explains unequivocally, by showing proof, the reason why that judgment was made in a clear and understable manner.

dimensions.name: truthfulness-2
dimensions.description: You are now asked to gather proof to provide your very own judgment on the statement.

justification.text: Provide an explanation of high quality illustrating the reason(s) behind your judgment.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: By websearching using this textbox, choose the website that guided your judgment. Be mindful that you should not pick a website just by its title, you need to examine its contents before you provide it as proof.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: After your search, express your thruthfulness judgment on the statement, based on the website you have chosen as proof.

answers.truthfulness-2_justification: The statement was true but it does not give credit to Trevor's work

response.name: Simple English Wikipedia - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
response.snippet: The Simple English Wikipedia is an English-language version of Wikipedia, an online encyclopedia, written in a language that is easy to understand but still natural and grammatical. All of the articles in the Simple English Wikipedia use shorter sentences and easier words and grammar than the regular English Wikipedia.

documents.statement: Hush (2016 film) was produced by Jason Blum.
documents.explanation: Hush (2016 film) was produced by Trevor Macy and Jason Blum.
documents.label: REFUTES

documents.statement: Hush (2016 film) was produced by Jason Blum.
documents.explanation: The evidence says that the film was produced by Trevor Macy and Jason Blum. The claim says that the film was produced by Jason Blum. So, the answer must be false because the film was produced by Trevor Macy, not just Jason Blum.
documents.label: REFUTES

documents.statement: Anne Rice was born in the United States of America.
documents.explanation: The claim is that Anne Rice was born in the United States of America. The evidence states that she was born in New Orleans and that New Orleans is a major United States port. Therefore, the claim is true.
